EmailTemplate.name: 2024 - Q2 - Manufacturing - Modular Offices
EmailTemplate.subject: Modular Office Building for {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi! Are you looking to expand your office space for your manufacturing facility? We offer modular office buildings designed to meet your specific needs with quick installation, cost-efficiency, and customizable designs.
--> View modular office complexes https://www.boxxmodular.com/offices/complexes/ --> View mobile offices https://www.boxxmodular.com/offices/mobile/ --> View used building inventory https://www.boxxmodular.com/used-modular/?sort=Name&restroom=0&areamin=0&areamax=null
To connect with us for more information: --> Reply to this email --> Request a quote on our website https://www.boxxmodular.com/quote-request/ --> Call 877-966-7839 to speak with one of our local experts We are here to help!
